member.name: T:ADB2CROPCXamarinForms.HelloService.AuthorizationPolicies.ScopesRequirement
member.summary: Requirement used in authorization policies, to check if the scope claim has at least one of the requirement values. Since the class also extends AuthorizationHandler, its dependency injection is done out of the box.

member.name: M:ADB2CROPCXamarinForms.HelloService.AuthorizationPolicies.ScopesRequirement.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ADB2CROPCXamarinForms.HelloService.AuthorizationPolicies.ScopesRequirement.HandleRequirementAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization.AuthorizationHandlerContext,ADB2CROPCXamarinForms.HelloService.AuthorizationPolicies.ScopesRequirement)
member.summary: AuthorizationHandler that will check if the scope claim has at least one of the requirement values.

member.name: T:ADB2CROPCXamarinForms.HelloService.Program
member.summary: On startup the app builds a host. The host encapsulates all of the application resources.

member.name: M:ADB2CROPCXamarinForms.HelloService.Program.CreateWebHostBuilder(System.String[])
member.summary: This method gets called by the runtime. Use this method to configure a host with a set of default options.

member.name: M:ADB2CROPCXamarinForms.HelloService.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: This method gets called by the runtime. Use this method to build a .NET generic host.

member.name: T:ADB2CROPCXamarinForms.HelloService.Startup
member.summary: Service startup where services required by the app are configured and the request handling pipeline is defined as a series of middleware components.

member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ADB2CROPCXamarinForms.HelloService.Startup.Configure(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostEnvironment)
member.summary: This method gets called by the runtime. Use this method to configure the HTTP request pipeline.

member.summary: This method gets called by the runtime. Use this method to add services to the container.
